hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Umar said:"The Prophet was asked about a man who divorced his wife three times, then another man married her and he closed the door and drew the curtain, then divorced her before consummating the marriage with her. He said: "She is not permissible for the first one (to remarry her) until the second one has had intercourse with her

chapter.ara-name: باب إِحْلاَلِ الْمُطَلَّقَةِ ثَلاَثًا وَالنِّكَاحِ الَّذِي يُحِلُّهَا بِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Making A Thrice-Divorced Woman Lawful (To Return To Her First Husband) And The Marriage That Makes T
